## ğŸ“ Customization

### Update Menu Items
Edit `src/data/menuData.ts`

### Change Colors
Edit `tailwind.config.ts`

### Update Contact Info
Edit `src/pages/Contact.tsx`

### Modify WhatsApp Number
Search for `260971716370` and replace with your number
